description: Retrieves the emergency calling configuration details for the specified Voice Connector.

nested_items.name: EmergencyCallingConfiguration
nested_items.description: The details of the emergency calling configuration.

nested_items.name: DNIS
nested_items.description: The Dialed Number Identification Service (DNIS) emergency calling configuration details.

nested_items.name: EmergencyPhoneNumber
nested_items.description: The DNIS phone number that you route emergency calls to, in E.164 format.

nested_items.name: TestPhoneNumber
nested_items.description: The DNIS phone number for routing test emergency calls to, in E.164 format.

nested_items.name: CallingCountry
nested_items.description: The country from which emergency calls are allowed, in ISO 3166-1 alpha-2 format.
